code: import React from'react';import HeroBgAnimation from'../HeroBgAnimation';import{HeroContainer,HeroBg,HeroLeftContainer,Img,HeroRightContainer,HeroInnerContainer,TextLoop,Title,Span,SubTitle,ResumeButton}from'./HeroStyle';import HeroImg from'../../images/HeroImage.jpg';import Typewriter from'typewriter-effect';import{Bio}from'../../data/constants';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var HeroSection=function HeroSection(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"about",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(HeroContainer,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HeroBg,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HeroBgAnimation,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(HeroInnerContainer,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(HeroLeftContainer,{id:"Left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Title,{children:["Hi, I am ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})," ",Bio.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TextLoop,{children:["I am a",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Span,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typewriter,{options:{strings:Bio.roles,autoStart:true,loop:true}})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SubTitle,{children:Bio.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResumeButton,{href:Bio.resume,target:"display",children:"Check Resume"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HeroRightContainer,{id:"Right",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Img,{src:HeroImg,alt:"hero-image"})})]})]})});};export default HeroSection;
